body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Alexander Rodriguez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Christine. How can I assist you today with your billing concerns?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm sad because I received an incorrect bill for my recent car service.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand the importance of accurate billing. Before we proceed, could you please confirm your phone number, slowly stating each digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, three two one, six nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. One more piece of information I need is your home address. Could you provide that for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Pine Street, Cityville, State Name, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine, for sharing your information. I will investigate the billing discrepancy and get back to you shortly. Your prompt assistance is appreciated. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Alexander. I appreciate your help. Have a great day too!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christine. Goodbye for now.
